name: Iron Clad Invasion
description:
The Hubble Telescope has detected an armed alien armada on their way on their way to Earth to
siege the human race and plunder our technological assets for their own twisted experiments.

Fortunately a group of highly trained scientists have designed and built an experimental
prototype star-fighter jet which has enough firepower to slip through the alien defenses and blow them back to where they came.

What we need now is a volunteer who is brave enough to pilot the jet into deep space and destroy as many enemies as he/she can. The global defences will take care of the rest.

Are YOU ready to sieze this opportunity!?
